top_comments.comment: If I have my labradoodle lie on my bed that adds texture, right?

comments_since_last_sample.body: It seems like almost everyone puts a huge rug under the bed leaving it peeking out at the sides. I guess that works better with neutrals. I usually prefer a bolder color palette and like to put smaller rugs around the bed, usually one on each side. That way, I can appreciate the rugs in their entirety and they make more of a statement.
